products.title: Full Height Boston Pearl Craft Wood Shutter
products.metadescription: Full height boston pearl craft wood shutter in cream. Made to measure from 69.66 with free uk mainland delivery. This craft wood shutter includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
For style you can rely on, we bring you the boston range of beautiful shutters. This range blends the character of craft wood with exceptional design to create a window dressing that is elegant and affordable. 
 With these full height shutters you can enjoy a light and fresh feel, whilst the creamy pearl finish brings a classic touch. 
 
 Product id: db-shu0003 fabric colour: pearl material: mdf craft wood   control type: centre tilt rod or louvre tilt energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Caf Style Boston Pearl Craft Wood Shutter
products.metadescription: Caf style boston pearl craft wood shutter in cream. Made to measure from 69.66 with free uk mainland delivery. This craft wood shutter includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
For style that will light up your space and uplift your mood, furnish your windows with their boston shutters. Made to measure and beautifully constructed from quality craft wood, these shutters provide an affordable yet luxurious option. 
 With the charming caf style design, you can enjoy an open and airy feel, whilst the creamy pearl finish brings a classic touch. 
 
 Product id: db-shu0014 fabric colour: pearl material: mdf craft wood   control type: centre tilt rod or louvre tilt energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
